blocks.name: idomrootle
blocks.content: No element of an integral domain can have more than ` N ` ` N ` -th roots. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: fiuneneq
blocks.content: Two finite sets of equal size have a union of the same size iff they were equal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiuneneq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn)), wb(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wceq(c0, c1))
  3expia(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, cun(c0, c1), w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wceq(c0, cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), cfn), wss(c0, cun(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, cun(c0, c1)))
  a1i(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wss(c0, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  ensymd(c0, cun(c0, c1), w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)))
  fisseneq(cun(c0, c1), c0)
  syl3anc(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wceq(c1, cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), cfn), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)), wbr(c1, cen, cun(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  mpbid(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  simp2(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0))
  3ad2ant1(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wb(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  enfi(c0, c1)
  unfi(c0, c1)
  a1i(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  ensymd(c1, cun(c0, c1), w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c1), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, c1))

  simp1(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0))
  entr(cun(c0, c1), c0, c1)
  fisseneq(cun(c0, c1), c1)
  syl5ibcom(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn)), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, c0))
  adantl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(c0, cen, c0))

thm fiuneneq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin)→((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0 ↔ c0 = c1))
} = {
  impbid((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0, c0 = c1)
  3expia(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0, c0 = c1)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, (c0 ⋃ c1), (c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0))
  syl3anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), c0 =(c0 ⋃ c1), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Fin, c0 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1), c0[≅](c0 ⋃ c1))
  a1i((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), c0 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  ensymd(c0, (c0 ⋃ c1), (c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0))
  fisseneq((c0 ⋃ c1), c0)
  syl3anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), c1 =(c0 ⋃ c1), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Fin, c1 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1), c1[≅](c0 ⋃ c1))
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  mpbid((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), c1 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  simp2(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0)
  3ad2ant1(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0, (c0 ∈ Fin ↔ c1 ∈ Fin))
  enfi(c0, c1)
  unfi(c0, c1)
  a1i((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), c1 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  ensymd(c1, (c0 ⋃ c1), (c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0))
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin ∧(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0), (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c1, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0, c0[≅]c1)
  simp3(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0)
  simp1(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0)
  entr((c0 ⋃ c1), c0, c1)
  fisseneq((c0 ⋃ c1), c1)
  syl5ibcom((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), c0 = c1, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]c0, c0[≅]c0)
  adantl(c0[≅]c1, c0 ∈ Fin, c0[≅]c0)
